trends: There has been one other sighting in Hope
There were no other sightings in Hope on or around April 25th 2010
Summary: UFO was in front of home looked as big as a football field.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Bother in law called me and said that he haated to wake us up but that he had to tell us about a UFO hovering in the front of his apartment.He and his room mate had noticed it and wnet out to look, It looked as long as a foot ball field, they called 911, then they proceeded to awaken a neighbor highway patrol man, he got his camera and started taking pictures. "B" did not have a cmera, the police arrived and told them it was a kite. It stayed for a long period of time and was still there when they went to bed. When they awoke this morning it was gone.It would be best to contact "B" by phone after 4pm central US time He works at night.
